subject: Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
Mine That Bird (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Mine That Bird, the upset winner of the Kentucky Derby, will run in the Preakness Stakes on May 16 at Pimlico Racecourse, his trainer, Chip Woolley, said on Monday.
snippet: Mine That Bird, the upset winner of the Kentucky Derby, will run in the Preakness Stakes on May 16 at Pimlico Racecourse, his trainer, Chip Woolley, said on Monday.
